title: Crystal Clear - Detox Roll-On with Crystal Infused Oils | Doji Pure Naturals & Wellness (Formerly The She Shoppe)
description: Essential oil blend infused with genuine crystal gems for cleansing and balancing emotions, relieving anxiety, and assisting in overall wellness.Our touch-therapy and aromatherapy oils are carefully dosed, blended for specific relief in a pure base oil for safe topical use.These ones are unique with the crystals inside the bottle. The special blends can help with a multitude of emotional and physical challenges. Best when used directly in the belly button.Ingredients: Crystal gems, Castor Oil, Lavender, Lemon, Frankincense Essential Oils.
